pages.text: 我的研究表明，灵魂之间有着种类之别. $(br)我可以通过 $(marked)启蒙之叹$()仪式来确定我的灵魂类别。

pages.title: Common Souls
pages.text: 我将灵魂类别分为了三个组别: 普通，稀有和传奇灵魂. 就如你们所想的, 组别分类的依据是其稀有度。$(marked)普通灵魂$()组完全由$(marked)源素灵魂$()组成, 这种类别的灵魂有着特定的源素倾向。

pages.title: Elemental Souls
pages.text: 源素灵魂又分为五种: 大气, 大地, 火焰, 水以及源力灵魂. 它们都是在多种条件的影响下，并由某个占据主导地位的源素创生而来的. $(br)需要注意的是，并没有像是 "以太灵魂"这种东西, 以太仅仅是空间, 并不会提供放出射线的可能性。

pages.title: 大气灵魂
pages.text: 由于在其创生过程中，大气源素占据了主导地位, these souls have developed an affinity for said aspect.$(br)Creatures of these souls tend to be agile, fast and deft.

pages.title: Earth Soul
pages.text: These souls are bound to earth and the body.$(br)Creatures of these souls are sturdy like stone, and tend to have connections to the more material world.

pages.title: Fire Soul
pages.text: Fire souls burn with the raw energy of fire. Their passion is expressed in warmth, and their rage is put to use in flames.$(br)They have a potential of power generally not seen in common souls.

pages.title: Water Soul
pages.text: Water souls go with the flow of energies, the flow of sentiments and the flow of the blood.$(br)They have one of the strongest connections to life and purity.

pages.title: Magan Soul
pages.text: Unlike the other common souls, the magan soul was not majorly influenced by one aspect, but by multiple aspects.$(br)Although this removed all professions, it granted them a healthy repertoire of magical power.

pages.title: Rare Souls
pages.text: The $(marked)Rare Souls$() are often built incorrectly or were lowly manipulated by an external force (of the special kind, mind you). $(br)People with rare souls often get interesting advantages at a cost.

pages.title: Mana Soul
pages.text: Mana souls have received an unhealthy amount of mana upon creation.$(br)Although this mana grants an immense capacity for magan, it interferes with other important functions, such as emotions.$(br)People with mana souls will still perceive the emotion; however, they will not $(o)feel$() it.

pages.title: Unstable Soul
pages.text: When the Silver Thread of a soul is damaged, the mind of the future inheritor is damaged, too. When this happens, an Unstable Soul is born.$(br)These souls have broken boundaries, which can have beneficial effects, but also harms $(t:This can also express as Warp)sanity$().

pages.title: Immutable Soul
pages.text: Some souls were born under more cruel circumstances than other souls. These souls can often only persist by acquiring a stronger Astral Body, which enhances their magic resistance.$(br)However, this comes at the cost of low magic affinity.$(br)These hardly changeable souls are called Immutable Souls.

pages.title: Balanced Soul
pages.text: Unlike most other rare souls, these souls suffer no disadvantages whatsoever. They might have been protected by some sort of higher entity, though this cannot be confirmed.$(br)One might consider them a jack of all trades.

pages.title: Extraordinary Souls
pages.text: The $(marked)Extraordinary Souls$() are kin of higher entities. Their power is immense (compared to the power of the other souls).$(br)These powers generally come without many disadvantages.

pages.title: Ancient Soul
pages.text: Ancient Souls directly descended from the Great Old Ones. Their magic power is equal the power of mana souls, except that it's provided by elder gods.$(br)Their connections to other deities are just as wide spread as their repertoire of spells.

pages.title: Dragon Soul
pages.text: The lullaby of these souls was the cosmic ballad, with its symphonies of fire and water, air and earth, in the field of aether.$(br)These souls have strong connections to all primal aspects, and the multiversal dragons.

pages.title: Ascended Souls
pages.text: Not all souls are directly created by the multiverse.$(br)Some are created by gods, nature, or even humans.$(br)These souls always keep a part of what they used to be; however, they are still one of the greatest mysteries to Soulogy.
